text: HubSpot has been unable to solve this in a week's time. My guess is they have misrepresented the capability of their tech and are tying to bug fix or spin up an answer in the meantime.

Its available and I am already using it. I am not sure how to update the version though. For me, they did as part of the support ticket I raised. If you get to know how, let me know too. :slightly_smiling_face:
If you refer their <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-api-nodejs/releases|github repo>, its release quite some time back.
That being said, I am not sure how to update the version, for me it was updated as part of an ongoing support ticket.
Per my research, I couldn't find any API to comments. If you find any, please share with me too.

Hello!
I am able to <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/notes#endpoint?spec=POST-/crm/v3/objects/notes:~:text=of%20this%20article.-,Create%20a%20note,-To%20create%20a|create a Note> in the *Ticket* through an API endpoint. However, I am not able to *PIN the Note* to keep it on the top. Is it possible by passing some property value to pin the note? Also, the property `hs_note_body` only takes string. So, there isn't any way to format the string like bold or something and also insert links and owner details in it?
If the above is not possible, is there a way atleast to comment in the Note?
Any help would be much appreciated!
Thanks!
Apologies for the frustration here. I see your support ticket and I have sent you a DM, Tim.
